code: import React from'react';import{TerminalIcon,UserIcon}from"@heroIcons/react/solid";import{testimonials}from"../data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Testimonials(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"testimonials",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserIcon,{className:"w-10 inline-block mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font text-white mb-12",children:"Client Testimonials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap m-4",children:testimonials.map(function(testimonial){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 md:w-1/2 w-full",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-full bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-80 p-8 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TerminalIcon,{className:"block w-8 text-gray-500 mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"leading-relaxed mb-6",children:testimonial.quote}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inline-flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"testimonial",src:testimonial.image,className:"w-12 rounded-full flex-shrink-0 object-cover object-center"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"flex-grow flex flex-col p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title-font font-medium text-white",children:testimonial.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-500 text-sm uppercase",children:testimonial.company})]})]})]})});})})]})});}
